text.section:
Personal property is not subject to valuation or to property tax, if the personal property is owned by:
a financial institution as defined in § 8-101(c) of the Tax - General Article other than a savings and loan association as defined in § 7-221.1 of this subtitle; or
a federal or State chartered credit union.
This exemption does not include any personal property that is leased, loaned, or made available by the institution for the use of a person whose business is not that of the institution.
